org.forgerock.openam.sts.rest.operation.translate

Interface TokenTranslateOperation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RestSTS
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RestSTSImpl, TokenTranslateOperationImpl

    public interface TokenTranslateOperation
    This class is the analogue to the Token{Issue/Validate/Renew/Cancel}Operation instances plugged-into the CXF-STS. It is a 'top-level' operation, invoked directly by the implementation of the RestSTS.validateToken method. It may be that other 'top-level' interfaces will be defined, corresponding to resful analogues of the {Issue/Validate/Renew/Cancel} operations defined in WS-Trust.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue translateToken(RestSTSTokenTranslationInvocationState invocationState, org.forgerock.services.context.Context context) 

    • Method Detail

      • translateToken

        org.forgerock.json.JsonValue translateToken(RestSTSTokenTranslationInvocationState invocationState,
                                            org.forgerock.services.context.Context context)
                                     throws TokenMarshalException,
                                            TokenValidationException,
                                            TokenCreationException
        Parameters:
        invocationState - The invocationState, as generated by the caller, containing the input and output token specifications
        context - The HttpContext
        Returns:
        A JsonValue with a 'issued_token' key and the value corresponding to the issued token
        Throws:
        TokenMarshalException - if the token state corresponding to the input and output tokens were incorrect
        TokenValidationException - if the input token could not be successfully validated
        TokenCreationException - if the output token could not be successfully produced
